title: How To Get Back Into The Market After Sidestepping A Correction
description: Staying in step with the market is one of the keys to outperformance. So after going to cash as a correction begins, what’s the best way to get back in when conditions begin to improve? Investor’s Business Daily market research director Justin Nielsen and Alissa Coram, IBD’s multimedia content editor, discuss IBD’s follow-through day concept and how to add exposure in a measured manner.
